channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 4 killed and multiple people wounded in Birmingham late night shooting, Alabama police say
item.description: Police say four people have died and more than 20 have been wounded following a shooting in a nightlife area in Birmingham, Alabama.

item.title: More shelter beds and a crackdown on tents means fewer homeless encampments in San Francisco
item.description: San Francisco’s sidewalks once notorious for sprawling tents belonging to homeless people are largely clear.

item.title: Why an Alaska island is using peanut butter and black lights to find a rat that might not exist
item.description: A purported sighting of a rat wouldn’t get much attention in many places around the world. But it caused a stir earlier this year on Alaska’s St. Paul Island.
